title: PA-20-06: Revisions to the Governmentwide Systems of Records Covering Ethics Records
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/9DFA080B5AC825B9852585CB006C5A41/$FILE/PA-20-06 Revisions to the Governmentwide Systems of Records Covering Ethics Records.pdf?open
summary: This Program Advisory details the recent revisions to the OGE/GOVT-1 and OGE/GOVT-2 governmentwide systems of records covering ethics records. The changes included several new and modified routine uses.
